Pre-Game Insights: Sunil Chhetri will be appearing in his 150th international match and the team hopes he will make it memorable by scoring a goal.
Igor Stimac has prioritised qualification to the third round of World Cup Qualifiers and secure a direct entry into the 2027 AFC Asian Cup.
Miscellaneous Highlights: India last scored a goal in November 2023 against Kuwait.
The Blue Tigers currently stand second in the group with four points from three games.
Others: India will need at least four points from their next three matches to remain in control of their fate.
